#fisheye 138.336 deg diagonal FOV (143 deg calibration FOV) | width, height, optical center X,Y, 1025 values theta-to-radius, corresponding to [0,pi], step pi/1024, extrapolated beyond real FOV, monotonically increasing
1920  #width
1080  #height
991.315  #optical center X, pixel coodinates - top-left pixel is (0.5, 0.5)
539.656  #optical center Y, pixel coodinates - top-left pixel is (0.5, 0.5)
0		#theta2r[0] = 0
3.45184	#theta2r[1], focal_length = theta2r[1] / (pi/1024)
